import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import DashboardSidebar from '../sidebar/sidebar.jsx'; import StickyBox from "react-sticky-box"; import { Modal, Figure } from 'react-bootstrap'; import IMG01 from "../../../assets/images/patient.jpg" // context import { EmployeeContext } from "../../../context/employee"; import DatePicker from "react-datepicker"; import moment from "moment"; import Loading from "../../loading/pageloading"; function Profile() { const { getProfile, profile, loading } = useContext(EmployeeContext); const { employeeInfo } = profile; const { category, country_id, email, mobile, photo, name, birthDate, address, city, state, zipCode, pref, educations, works, languages, skills } = employeeInfo; const categoryObj = category ? { ...category } : {} const photoUrl = photo ? `http://excodeteam.com/crs/public/images/${photo}` : IMG01; useEffect(() => { getProfile(); }, []) return ( <>
  1. Home
  2. Profile

Profile

< DashboardSidebar />
{loading ? : <>

{name}

{categoryObj.name}

  • {country_id}
  • {email}
  • {mobile}
  • {/* */} Pending Proposals (5)
  • {/* */} Accepted Proposals (6)
  • {/* */} Selected Proposals (7)
  • {/* */} Rejected Proposals (8)

About Me

{pref}

Education

    { educations && educations.map(item => { return (

  • {item.title}

    {item.specialization}
    {`${item.from_date} - ${item.to_date}`}
    • ) }) }

Work & Experience

    { works && works.map(item => { return (

  • {item.title}

    {item.organization}
    {`${item.from_date} - ${item.to_date}`}
    • ) }) }

Languages

    { languages && languages.map(item => { return (
  • {`${item.name} (${item.level})`}
    • ) }) }

Skills

    { skills && skills.map(item => { return (
  • {item.name}
    • ) }) }
}
) } export default Profile;
